snippet.title: Super Mario Sunshine Seaside - Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Super Mario Sunshine Seaside is my mod of New Super Mario Bros. U for Wii U.
In this 1-world mod, Mario ventures off to a sunny tropical island, exploring 8 unique levels in his quest to defeat Bowser Jr.
The mod is now released, and you can find the download link in the description of the release trailer here: https://youtu.be/c99S56M0Ctk

The trailer was recorded and edited by @Rimea, the narrator for this trailer is ​@TurbPingouin.

This trailer was also shown in the New Super Mario Bros. U Anniversary Modding Direct by Rimea: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vwak5DkfsMw
Even though this trailer is available alongside the release trailer, the footage here is several months old so some parts of the mod will be different when playing.

Sunshine Seaside's Gamebanana Page: https://gamebanana.com/wips/67330
